name: Hidden Artifacts: Hidden Objects Game
description:
Join Detectives Alex and Rhianna of the Hidden Artifact Agency to solve a series of cases in a story of crime and intrigue.

Travel through this hidden object adventure game to exciting locations such as London and Rome to seek and find lost treasures. Search though vivid, realistic pictures to uncover obscure objects and clues within the scene. Seek unusual and sometimes evasive characters throughout this story in order to solve mysterious quests and uncover secret ancient artifacts.

Will you be able to solve the mysteries, put away the criminals, and become the premier Hidden Artifact Detective? Seek and find objects in this FREE crime drama!

Features:
- Seek and find items to solve numerous criminal cases containing multiple hidden object scenes.
- Scan through highly detailed pictures for clues to the whereabouts of the lost treasure.
- Picture yourself as the lead detective in this crime story. Find out who’s the real criminal.
- Travel and search through unique locations and intriguing crime scenes for rare treasure.
- Solve exciting brain teaser mini-games wrapped in mystery.
- Play through Special Investigations for endless fun.
- Spin the Fortune Wheel for a daily bonus!
- Install and play for FREE!

For more information on upcoming cases, “like” and follow the Hidden Artifacts Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/HiddenArtifacts

Need help with our free game? Visit our Support Center
https://goo.gl/LeAiQx
